title: Nevada Mind The Bollix Part One
description: Is it the end of the line for veteran rocker Geordie Selwyn and for the future of Rock itself?With its story travelling between 1970's London and New York in the last desperate days of punk-rock to the neon glitz of twenty first century Las Vegas, Nevada Mind The Bollix tells the epic tale of three generations of rock musicians and the secrets and horrors that bind them together.Full to the brim with unforgettable characters and rich with period detail, Nevada Mind The Bollix starts where Appetite for Corruption left off. You will be reunited with old friends and meet new ones as The Harvesters once again spin their greedy web around the world of rock and roll.
author: Hilary Mortz
